extension-descriptor.name: Default plugins for BizDock

configuration-block.name: plugin.jira.config.main.name
configuration-block.description: plugin.jira.config.main.description
configuration-block.default: host.url= authentication.key= api.version=1.0 pe.load.start_time=03h00 pe.load.frequency=1440

configuration-block.name: plugin.jira.config.status_mapping.name
configuration-block.description: plugin.jira.config.status_mapping.description
configuration-block.default: #format: {jira_status_id}={bizdock_requirement_status_id}, example: #OPEN=4 #IN_PROGRESS=1

configuration-block.name: plugin.jira.config.priority_mapping.name
configuration-block.description: plugin.jira.config.priority_mapping.description
configuration-block.default: #format: {jira_priority_id}={bizdock_requirement_priority_id}, example: #BLOCKER=4 #CRITICAL=1

configuration-block.name: plugin.jira.config.severity_mapping.name
configuration-block.description: plugin.jira.config.severity_mapping.description
configuration-block.default: #format: {jira_severity_id}={bizdock_requirement_severity_id}, example: #SHOWSTOPPER=4 #NICE_TO_HAVE=1

plugin.name: Jenkins (by DevDock)
plugin.description: Jenkins is a leading open source continuous integration software

configuration-block.name: Configuration properties
configuration-block.description: Configuration properties for the plugin
configuration-block.default: jenkins.gui.url=/jenkins

plugin.name: Nexus (by DevDock)
plugin.description: Nexus is a software asset repository management software

configuration-block.name: Configuration properties
configuration-block.description: Configuration properties for the plugin
configuration-block.default: nexus.gui.url=/nexus

plugin.name: Redmine (by DevDock)
plugin.description: The DevDock Redmine plugin deal with the synchronization of DevDock Redmine with BizDock.

configuration-block.name: Global properties
configuration-block.description: Global properties for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #initial configuration redmine.host.url= redmine.api.key= is_scoped.custom_field.id= story_points.custom_field.id= remaining_effort.custom_field.id= pe.iterations.filter= pe.needs.filter= pe.needs.trackers=2;4 pe.defects.filter= pe.defects.trackers=1 pe.load.start.time=03h00 pe.load.frequency=1440

configuration-block.name: Requirement status mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine status and the BizDock requirement status.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_status_id}={bizdock_requirement_status_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

configuration-block.name: Requirement priority mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine priorities and the BizDock requirement priorities.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_priority_id}={bizdock_requirement_priority_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

configuration-block.name: Requirement severity mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine priorities and the BizDock requirement severities.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_priority_id}={bizdock_requirement_severity_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

plugin.name: Redmine
plugin.description: The Redmine plugin deal with the synchronization of Redmine with BizDock.

configuration-block.name: Global properties
configuration-block.description: Global properties for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #initial configuration redmine.host.url= redmine.api.key= is_scoped.custom_field.id= story_points.custom_field.id= remaining_effort.custom_field.id= pe.iterations.filter= pe.needs.filter= pe.needs.trackers=2;4 pe.defects.filter= pe.defects.trackers=1 pe.load.start.time=03h00 pe.load.frequency=1440

configuration-block.name: Requirement status mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine status and the BizDock requirement status.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_status_id}={bizdock_requirement_status_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

configuration-block.name: Requirement priority mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine priorities and the BizDock requirement priorities.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_priority_id}={bizdock_requirement_priority_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

configuration-block.name: Requirement severity mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the Redmine priorities and the BizDock requirement severities.
configuration-block.default: #format: {redmine_priority_id}={bizdock_requirement_severity_id}, example: #1=4 #2=1

plugin.name: SVN (by DevDock)
plugin.description: Subversion is a source code and configuration management software

configuration-block.name: Configuration
configuration-block.description: Please specify the configuration options for the plugin.
configuration-block.default: #Sample configuration (please update it with appropriate values) subversion.gui.url=/svn #WARNING : please remember to escape the "," in the LDAP URL if any is present ldap.url=ldap://localhost ldap.user=cn=Directory Manager ldap.password= subversion.developer.ldap.group=developer subversion.delivery.manager.ldap.group=dm

plugin.name: BizDock Employee loader
plugin.description: This plugin provides the ability to load BizDock employees from a CSV file with various options

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: Various configuration options for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #Default configuration (WARNING: debug mode is activated by default) test.mode=true csv.format=EXCEL input.file.charset=ISO8859-1 input.file.path=/inputs/input-actor.csv automatic.load.by.scheduler=false load.start.time=00h00 load.frequency.in.minutes=1440 ignore.invalid.rows=false unactivate.not.found=false unactivate.selection.clause= report.mail= report.file.path=/outputs/report-actor.log

configuration-block.name: CSV file mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the CSV file columns and the Object attributes. This configuration is implemented as JavaScript.

plugin.name: BizDock Timesheet loader
plugin.description: This plugin provides the ability to load timesheets from an external system

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: Various configuration options for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #Default configuration (WARNING: debug mode is activated by default) test.mode=true csv.format=EXCEL input.file.charset=ISO8859-1 input.file.path=/inputs/timesheet_import.csv automatic.load.by.scheduler=false load.start.time=00h00 load.frequency.in.minutes=1440 ignore.invalid.rows=false report.mail= report.file.path=/outputs/report-timesheet.log

configuration-block.name: CSV file mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the CSV file columns and the Object attributes. This configuration is implemented as JavaScript.

plugin.name: BizDock Org Unit loader
plugin.description: This plugin provides the ability to load BizDock org units from a CSV file with various options

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: Various configuration options for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #Default configuration (WARNING: debug mode is activated by default) test.mode=true csv.format=EXCEL input.file.charset=ISO8859-1 input.file.path=/inputs/input-org-unit.csv automatic.load.by.scheduler=false load.start.time=00h00 load.frequency.in.minutes=1440 ignore.invalid.rows=false unactivate.not.found=false unactivate.selection.clause= report.mail= report.file.path=/outputs/report-org-unit.log

configuration-block.name: CSV file mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the CSV file columns and the Object attributes. This configuration is implemented as JavaScript.

plugin.name: BizDock Financial integration
plugin.description: Integrate you financial ERP solution with BizDock (load POs and budgets).

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: Various configuration options for the plugin
configuration-block.default: #Default configuration (WARNING: debug mode is activated by default) test.mode=true csv.format=EXCEL input.file.charset=ISO8859-1 input.file.path=/inputs/input-finance.csv automatic.load.by.scheduler=false load.start.time=00h00 load.frequency.in.minutes=1440 ignore.invalid.rows=false unactivate.not.found=false unactivate.selection.clause= report.mail= report.file.path=/outputs/report-finance.log

configuration-block.name: CSV file mapping
configuration-block.description: The configuration of the mapping between the CSV file columns and the Object attributes. This configuration is implemented as JavaScript.

plugin.name: BizDock Event handler
plugin.description: The event handler plugin is a BizDock plugin which trigger some actions (mail, web service...) when a BizDock data is created/changed/deleted.

configuration-block.name: Hook script
configuration-block.description: A script which defines which events are to be listened and what actions must be performed for a named event. Please note that such script may have some impact on the global performance of the system.

plugin.name: BizDock URL integration
plugin.description: Light integration plugin based on simple URL

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: The URL and label parameters for the link
configuration-block.default: #If the path is empty, no menu is added in BizDock external.service.path= external.service.label=

plugin.name: BizDock Scheduled script
plugin.description: A script to be scheduled at a configurable frequency

configuration-block.name: Parameters
configuration-block.description: The scheduler parametesr (start time and frequency)
configuration-block.default: #Define a start time for the scheduler and a frequency. Frequency must be higher than 5 minutes #start.time=00h00 #frequency.in.minutes=1440

configuration-block.name: Hook script
configuration-block.description: A script which will be run at the specified frequency

plugin.name: BizDock Standard Widget Library
plugin.description: The standard list of common widgets for BizDock

extension-descriptor.i18n-messages:
#---------------------- # plugin / redmine / portfolio entry #----------------------
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.header=The initiative is currently not registered to be synchronized with a Redmine project. Please select one of the following options to start the registration process: plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.label=Create a new project in Redmine plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.confirmation=Are you sure you want to create a new project in Redmine? plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.successfull=The Redmine project has been successfully created. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.error=An error has occurred and the Redmine project was not created. Please try again or contact your administrator if the problem persists. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.warn.already_existing=The Redmine project has not been created because it is already existing. Please use the following form to associate it. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.select.label=Select an existing project from Redmine
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_project_link.confirmation=Are you sure you want to remove this link? plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.confirmation=Are you sure you want to remove the Redmine synchronization for the initiative?
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.trigger_load.successfull=The synchronization process has been triggered. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.save_configuration.successfull=The configuration has been updated. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_project_link.successfull=The link with the Redmine project has been removed. This process is done asynchronously: the result will be effective and visible in few seconds. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.successfull=The initiative is no more registered. The removing of the corresponding requirements and iterations is done asynchronously.
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.title=Select and associate a Redmine project plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.label=Redmine project plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.error.already_associated=This Redmine project is already associated to the initiative. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.successfull=The Redmine project has been successfully associated.
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.plugindetails.title=Plugin details plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.title=Administration plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.trigger.action=Trigger the load plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.unregister.action=Unregister the initiative plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.title=Configuration plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.needs.label=Needs plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.defects.label=Defects plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.iterations.label=Iterations plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.projects.title=Related Redmine projects

plugin.jira.portfolio_entry.trigger_load.successfull=The synchronization process has been triggered. plugin.jira.portfolio_entry.save_configuration.successfull=The configuration has been updated. plugin.jira.portfolio_entry.remove_project_link.successfull=The link with the Redmine project has been removed. plugin.jira.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.successfull=The initiative is no more registered.

#---------------------- # plugin / widget kit #----------------------
plugin.widget_kit.edit_widget.already_open=Another widget is already opened in configuration mode: Please configure it before editing this one. plugin.widget_kit.unread_notifications.title=Unread notifications plugin.widget_kit.unread_notifications.description=Display the unread notifications (if you activated the internal notification system) plugin.widget_kit.unread_notifications.unavailable=This widget is unavailable because the notification sending system used by BizDock is "Email". plugin.widget_kit.last_initiatives.title=Last created initiatives plugin.widget_kit.last_initiatives.description=Display the last created initiatives (according to the user permissions) plugin.widget_kit.last_initiatives.create=Create an initiative plugin.widget_kit.help.title=Help plugin.widget_kit.help.description=Display some links to the official BizDock support. plugin.widget_kit.help.bizdock=What is BizDock? plugin.widget_kit.help.create=Create an initiative plugin.widget_kit.help.roadmap=Roadmap plugin.widget_kit.help.reporting=Reporting plugin.widget_kit.help.profile=My profile plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.title=Quick links plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.description=Display direct links to major BizDock functionalities. plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.new_initiative.label=New initiative plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.new_initiative.description=Submit an idea or start a new project plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.roadmap.label=Roadmap plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.roadmap.description=View all initiatives and filter them according to your needs plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.reporting.label=Reporting plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.reporting.description=Improve your analysis capabilities with BizDock reports plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.search.label=Search plugin.widget_kit.quick_links.search.description=Find easily and quickly what you want plugin.widget_kit.no_actor.help=Your BizDock user account is not associated with an employee. Consequently, this widget is not available. plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives.title=My active initiatives plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives.description=Displays the active initiatives (as manager and as stakeholder) of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives_as_manager.title=My active initiatives as manager plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives_as_manager.description=Displays the active initiatives (as manager) of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives_as_stakeholder.title=My active initiatives as stakeholder plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives_as_stakeholder.description=Displays the active initiatives (as stakeholder) of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives.as_manager=As manager plugin.widget_kit.my_initiatives.as_stakeholder=As stakeholder plugin.widget_kit.my_portfolios.title=My active portfolios plugin.widget_kit.my_portfolios.description=Displays the active portfolios (as manager and as stakeholder) of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_portfolios.as_manager=As manager plugin.widget_kit.my_portfolios.as_stakeholder=As stakeholder plugin.widget_kit.my_budget_buckets.title=My active budget buckets plugin.widget_kit.my_budget_buckets.description=Displays the active budget buckets (as owner and as responsible) of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_budget_buckets.as_owner=As owner plugin.widget_kit.my_budget_buckets.as_responsible=As responsible plugin.widget_kit.my_staff.title=My staff plugin.widget_kit.my_staff.description=Displays the active subordinates and org units of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.my_staff.subordinates=Subordinates plugin.widget_kit.my_staff.org_units=Org units plugin.widget_kit.timesheets_subordinates.title=Timesheets of subordinates plugin.widget_kit.timesheets_subordinates.description=Displays the timesheets to review and the late timesheets of the subordinates of the current sign-in user. plugin.widget_kit.timesheets_subordinates.late=Late timesheets plugin.widget_kit.timesheets_subordinates.submitted=Timesheets to review plugin.widget_kit.late_planned_milestones_widget.title=Late planned milestones plugin.widget_kit.late_planned_milestones_widget.description=Displays Late planned milestones. plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.title=Initiative's KPI plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.description=Displays a specific KPI for a selected initiative. plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.form.kpi_uid=KPI plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.form.portfolio_entry_id=Initiative plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.form.error.unknown_kpi=The KPI doesn't exist or is not active. plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.form.error.unknown_pe=The initiative doesn't exist. plugin.widget_kit.initiative_kpi.form.error.unauthorized=You are not authorized to display this KPI for the selected initiative.

#---------------------- # plugin / redmine / portfolio entry #----------------------
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.header=Initiative nicht registriert, muss mit Redmine Projekt synchronisiert werden. Bitte wählen Sie eine der folgenden Optionen aus um den Registrierungsprozess zu starten: plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.confirmation=Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie in Redmine ein neues Projekt eröffnen wollen? plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.successfull=Redmine Projekt eröffnet. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.error=Fehler: Redmine Projekt konnte nicht eröffnet werden. Bitte versuchen Sie es nochmals oder kontaktieren Sie den Administartor. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.warn.already_existing=Redmine Projekt existiert bereits, es wurde kein Neues eröffnet. Bitte benutzen Sie folgendes Formular um die Verknüpfung herzustellen. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.label=Neues Redmine Projekt eröffnen plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.select.label=Bestehendes Redmine Projekt wählen
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_project_link.confirmation=Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie diesen Link löschen wollen? plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.confirmation=Sind Sie sicher, dass Sie die Synchronisation dieser Initiative mit Redmine löschen wollen?
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.trigger_load.successfull=Synchronisation gestarted. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.save_configuration.successfull=Konfiguration aktualisiert. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_project_link.successfull=Verknüpfung mit dem Redmine-Projekt gelöscht. Dies geschieht asynchron, das Ergebnis wird in wenigen Sekunden sichtbar sein. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.successfull=Initiative nicht mehr registriert. Die entsprechenden Anforderungen und Iterationen werden nun asychron gelöscht.
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.title=Redmine Projekt wählen und verknüpfen plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.label=Redmine Projekt plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.error.already_associated=Dieses Redmine Projekt ist bereits mit eine Initiative verknüpft. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.select_project.successfull=Redmine Projekt wurde verknüpft.
plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.plugindetails.title=Plugin details plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.title=Verwalten plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.trigger.action=Starten plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.administration.unregister.action=Verküpfung mit Initiative löschen plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.title=Konfiguration plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.needs.label=Anforderungen plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.defects.label=Mängel plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.configuration.iterations.label=Iterations plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.index.projects.title=Zugehörige Redmine Projekte

#---------------------- # plugin / redmine / portfolio entry #---------------------- plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.header=Cette initiative n'est pas enregistrée pour être synchronisée avec un projet Redmine. Veuillez sélectionner une des options ci-dessous pour commencer le processus d'enregistrement. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.confirmation=Etes-vous sûr(e) de vouloir créer un nouveau projet dans Redmine? plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.successfull=Le projet Redmine a été créé. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.error=Une erreur est survenue et le projet Redmine n'a pas pu être créé. Veuillez réessayer ou contacter votre administrateur si le problème persiste. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.warn.already_existing=Le projet Redmine n'a pas été créé car il existe déjà. Veuillez utiliser le formulaire ci-dessous pour le lier. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.create.label=Créer un nouveau projet dans Redmine plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.not_registered.select.label=Sélectionner un projet existant de Redmine

Cette opération est réalisée de manière asynchrone: le résultat sera effectif et visible dans quelques secondes. plugin.redmine.portfolio_entry.remove_registration.successfull=L'initiative n'est plus enregistrée. La suppression des exigences et itérations correspondantes est réalisée de manière asynchrone.
